Lady Hawk was frustrated by the annoying call from Squizzy, she was so close
to finding a way into the classified files. She stopped her selfish thoughts
and reminded herself on why she was there. She was there to help her father
find a way to unite the factions, not hack files. Sheshut down the computer,
stood up and started toward the door. "I'm on my way" She hoped the bot
wasn't to badly hurt she was a science bot not a doctor. It was just more
DNA to her regaurdless of the bots faction it still had DNA and that made it
worth helping.

" how bad is it?" She asked as she entered the CR room, the bot didn't look
to injured just a damaged leg. the CR chamber should be able to handle the
damage easy enough so she didn't worry to much. She aproached Squizzy with
caution knowing how mongooses loved Hawks.

 "You know, the more I think about it, the more I like your idea of making
the bots to better suit  the eco system around here." Squizzy said as Lady
Hawk aproached " but even with
the perfect body, it's the mond of the bot that makes me cringe. How can we
make a bot's mind so he or she will be nature oriented?" The young bots
points were a valid concern, A concern that Veratis had thought of multiple
times.

Lady Hawkchose her words carefully so she didn't reveal the full idea. "That
is the difference between who I want to obtain the technology and who would
abuse the technology."  She watched the readings on the CR chamber wondering
what the new bot knew about this war."If the technology was abused we'd just
have a more violent form of war to fight. No instincts to induce fear means
no fear to hold a bot back." she shuddered to think about what Zardus would
do with the technology but knew that when her fathers goal was reached there
wouldn't be anything to worry about.


----- Original Message -----
From: <logomorph@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Saturday, October 21, 2000 9:13 AM
Subject: Neo Beast Wars..


> Squizzy::
>
> She had her head filled the ideas of creating a balance between
> nature and transformer.  Despite the smiling face she had kept up for
> Lady Hawk, she needed a breather.  She looked at Ladyhawk. "I'll be
> right back."  She walkded out of the lab and down the hallway.  She
> passsed the entrance when she noticed a bot outside the entrance
> doorway.  She openend the door hatch and looked at the bot. "Holy!"
> She bent down and tried to pick up the bot, but being smaller than
> most Predacons, she couldn't.  She called to LadyHawk. "HEY! I GOT AN
> INJURED BOT OUT HERE. I'll need your help on this. Like right now."
>
>
>
>
